gggenomes 0.8.1.9000

    • From a few sequences to a complex map in minutes

Draw links

Source: R/geom_link.R
geom_link.Rd

Note .adjacent_only=TRUE is somewhat redundant with layout_links(adjacent_only =TRUE), which currently is always set to TRUE

geom_link(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = links(),
  stat = "identity",
  position = "identity",
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE,
  offset = 0.15,
  ...
)

Arguments

offset

distance between seq center and link start. Use two values c(<offset_top>, <offset_bottom>) for different top and bottom offsets

Examples

p <- gggenomes(emale_seqs[1:6,], links = emale_ava) + geom_seq()
p + geom_link()

# change offset from seqs
p + geom_link(aes(fill=de, color=de), offset = 0.05) +
  scale_fill_viridis_b() + scale_colour_viridis_b()

# combine with flip
p %>% flip(3,4,5) + geom_link()
